O

onBindViewHolder(MovieReviewAdapter.ViewHolder, int) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.MovieReviewAdapter
when view holder is bound, gives holder document snapshot as well as a boolean value telling it whether it needs to enable the buttons on that view (usually based on user login status)
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.CreateAccountActivity
initializes user preferences, google firestore connection, and all views on the page
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.CreateReviewActivity
grabs handle to shared preferences, makes connection to firebase, and initializes all views on the page to give them functionality
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.LoginActivity
When activity is created, initializes all views on the page, makes connection to firestore, and pulls down handles to shared preferences
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.MainActivity
grabs user preferences, logs in the user if they have stored login credentials, grabs a handle to this activity's context so that MovieReview and User classes may access shared preferences as needed (w/o a context), initialize connection to database, initialize all views on the screen
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.MovieSearchActivity
grabs the query that brought the user here, uses it to initialize a connection to the firestore and generate a query, then initializes all views (including the recyclerview)
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.ViewAccountActivity
initializes shared preferences, connection to firestore, and the recycler view
onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup, int) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.MovieReviewAdapter
when a view holder is created, this takes its parent inflator and returns a new viewholder containing the information needed to inflate the view
onDataChanged() - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.FirestoreAdapter
Template function to do something when data on the document snapshot is modified.
onDocumentAdded(DocumentChange) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.FirestoreAdapter
Updates document snapshot list when a document has been added and updates indices
onDocumentModified(DocumentChange) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.FirestoreAdapter
Updates document snapshot when it has been modified, indices remain unchanged
onDocumentRemoved(DocumentChange) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.FirestoreAdapter
Updates document snapshot list when a document is removed and updates indices
onError(FirebaseFirestoreException) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.FirestoreAdapter
Template function to do something when modifying the document snapshots returns an error.
onEvent(QuerySnapshot, FirebaseFirestoreException) - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.FirestoreAdapter
Puts the onDocumentXXX functions together into an onEvent handler
onStart() - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.MainActivity
for the recycler view to know to listen to db and user input on activity start
onStart() - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.MovieSearchActivity
for the recycler view to know to listen to db and user input on activity start
onStart() - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.ViewAccountActivity
for the recycler view to know to listen to db and user input on activity start
onStop() - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.MainActivity
for the recycler view to know to stop listening to db and user input on activity end
onStop() - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.MovieSearchActivity
for the recycler view to know to stop listening to db and user input on activity end
onStop() - Method in class com.example.myurbanflix.ViewAccountActivity
for the recycler view to know to stop listening to db and user input on activity end
